dmca.title: DMCA Complaints
dmca.body:
About.com

[private] 
Web Design/HGML Guide @About.com
[private]
Snohomish, WA [private]

September 29, 2007

Google, Inc.
Attn: Blogger Legal Support, DMCA complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA [private]

Dear Sir or Madam:
It's come to my attention that the content I wrote for About.com is currently on a Blogger site.
I'd appreciate it if you'd please remove this content.  It's copyrighted material.
1. Identify in sufficient detail the copyrighted work that you believe has been infringed upon.  This must include identification of specific posts, as opposed to entire sites.  Posts must be referenced by either the dates in which they appear or the permalink of the post.  The following posts are infringing upon my copyright:
a) http://webdesign.about.com/cs/webdesign/a/aa032403a.htm
b)http://webdesign.about.com/cs/beginninghtml/a/aabg012499.htm
c)http://webdesign.about.com/od/authoring/a/aa040907.htm
d)http://webdesign.about.com/od/colortheory/ss/aa/040907.htm
e) http://webdesign.about.com/cs/color//aacolotheory.htm
f) http://webdesign.about.com/od/fonts/a/aa082400a.htm
h)http://webdesign.about.com/od/layout/a/aa062104.htm
i)http://webdesign.about.com/od/webdesigntutorials/a/aa070504.htm

2. Identify the material that you claim is infringing upon the copyrighted work listed in item #1 above.

You must identify each post by permalink or date that allegedly contains infringing material.  Ther permalink for post is usually found by clicking on the timestamp of the post.

a) http://trainingandtips.blogspot.com/2007/09/getting-attention-with-your-site-design.html
b) http://trainingandtips.blogspot.com/2007/09/keeping-images-small-on-your-site.html
c)http://trainingandtips.blogspot.com/2007/09/creating-great-web-page.html
d)http://trainingandtips.blogspot.com/2007/09/creating-web-color-scheme.html
e)http://trainingandtips.blogspot.com/2007/09/color-on-your-web-site.html
f)http://trainingandtips.blogspot.com/2007/09/building-your-home-page.html
g)http://trainingandtips.blogspot.com/2007/09/changing-font-attributes.html
h)http://trainingandtips.blogspot.com/2007/09/basics-of-web-layout.html
i)http://trainingandtips.blogspot.com/2007/09/basics-of-web-design.html

3.  Provide information reasonably sufficient to permit Blogger to contact you (email address is preferred).

[private]@about.com

[private]

[private]
[private]
Snohomish, WA [private]

4. Include the following statement:

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

5. Include the following statement:

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

I appreciate your prompt attention.

Thank you,
[private]
Web Design/ HTML Guide @ About.com
